Title: Vintage Inspired High Necked Evening Dress

----

Sizes: 14, 12, 16, 4, 8, 6, 10

Colors: offwhite

Category: evening, formal-gowns

Featured-image: 7953-off-white-vintage-inspired-high-necked-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: This gown features looks from the 1920s. It is modern while showing a hint of the old glamor. The high neckline adds sophistication to the gown and the sweetheart neckline with sheer overlay creates a fun chic look. There is beading in intricate designs to add to the sparkle of this gown. The floor length chiffon completes the look.
